comment: God ended his covenant with Israel. They are wandering the wilderness until Christ's return. The racist, apartheid state of Israel has nothing to do with Israel in the Bible. If any of the descendants of Abraham, Issac and Jacob still reside in the holy land, they are to be found among the palestinians, not the Ashkenazi Khazarian Synagogue of Satan.
